item.title: The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
item.description: The man I had a drunken one-night stand with turned out to be the male lead from the original story. The issue? This ridiculously rich, handsome, and incredibly fit younger guy is set to start a war in two years. And me? I need to get out of here, obviously. So, I said, "I only liked you for your money." "Is that so? I have plenty of money. Does that mean you like me a lot, then?" He leaned in, planting a light kiss on my cheek, then asked in a low voice, "Besides the money, what else do you like about me? Yesterday, it seemed like you were quite into my face and body too." "What?" "I'm guessing you‚Äôre in love with me..." "Ack!" Instinctively, I screamed to block his love confession. But Kyle, as if he'd just realized something, grinned brightly. "I get it now, noona. You don‚Äôt want to hear me say I love you, right?" Exactly, that‚Äôs it! "In that case, I‚Äôll express it in a way you like better than words." With that, Kyle tugged his tie loose and stepped closer to me. No! I don't want you to express it with your body either!

item.title: Rebirth of the Excellent Daughter of the Marquis Household (REDMH)
item.description: Gu Yu Qi, a daughter born to a marquis household. She was beautiful with knowledge in both civil and military, and her kindness broader than the sky. It was love at first sight for her, and she insisted on marrying him and was happy even if she were to become a mistress. She worked hard to help him step by step to become the emperor. But what happened to her in the end? For ten whole years, she was humiliated and abandoned. Disheartened, she drank poison to end her life and set her place on fire, only to find herself back to when she was ten years old. It was the year she followed her mother into the capital. It wasn‚Äôt too late to change her fate. If Yun Ke had any regrets in his previous life, then it would be how he always kept thinking about a woman who died decades ago. Because of that, before he died, he secretly had the woman‚Äôs ashes pressed beneath his coffin. As the emperor, he had the final say of everything under the sky. So how could he allow that woman to be arrogant in front of him? Even at his deathbed, he would crush her beneath him. Who knew he‚Äôd be reborn again‚Ä¶ When the transmigrated girl meets the boy who was reborn, Gu Yu Qi simply wanted to yell at the sky. Just what are you playing at!?

item.title: The Tyrant's Happy Ending
item.description: BL fantasy novel set in a Western-style Omegaverse. It follows the story of Lyle Beltimore, a duke who rises to power after being betrayed by his first love, Yernen Helio, a prince who later becomes a tyrant. Lyle returns to the capital after years of war and finds Yernen dead. However, Yernen reincarnates into the body of Prince Fortnum, Lyle‚Äôs new fianc√©, and must now navigate his second life, torn between his past regrets and the possibility of a new future with Lyle. Themes of love, betrayal, revenge, and redemption are central to the plot, with intense emotional struggles and a chance at a happy ending in Yernen‚Äôs second life.

item.title: After Rebirth, I Married my Archenemy
item.description:
Before her death, Qun Qing hated the powerful official Lu Huating the most. She hated him for assisting the new emperor and for being cunning and insidious. She thought about him day and night, and tried her best to defeat him, but she was not his match. In the end, she became a cannon fodder in his hands. After Qun Qing died, she saw the princess of the fallen country that she had protected with her life, crying and leaning on the new emperor's chest: "Qung Qing is dead, what should I do?" The new emperor kissed her: "You will be fine, just love me." The princess burst into tears, like a delicate flower under the rain: "Qung Qing is dead, Your Majesty is all I have left." When she opened his eyes, Qun Qing had woke up three years ago. She stood up, woodenly packed her bags, and regardless of the princess's obstruction, took off her jade crown and walked away, dropped her female official's wooden seal, turned around and left, leaving behind ten years of careful planning and treading on thin ice. Restore the country? Pfft, restore it my foot. ------ The powerful minister Lu Huating is deeply cunning, ruthless, and dominates the power struggles of the court. Tired of the ugly nature of human hearts, his life has become dull and unfulfilling. Looking back on his life, the only thing that left an impression was a female officer, a spy, whom he poisoned to death at the age of twenty-six. For the love of the princess, she sacrificed his life for the country and schemed against him several times. In the end, she knelt in front of the Summer Palace, her facial expression remaining unchanged, with a look of resentment in her eyes, and sighed with a smile, "The king who wins is the ruler, and the one who loses is the defeated," before raising her head and drinking to the last drop. Blood poured from her lips, a thin layer of vivid red. When he opened his eyes again, Lu Huating returned to his twenty-three-year-old self. Lu Huating looked at the documents under his command, and felt even more bored. He put down his brush and leaned on the back of the chair: "Where is the female official accompanying Crown Princess?" "... She resigned. She asked me to tell My lord that she would not fight anymore." Lu Huating was silent for a while, and curled his lips coldly: "She said she won't fight, so the fight is over?"
If you‚Äôre enjoying the story, please consider:

item.title: Gloria von Caldwell's Condemnation and Revenge
item.chaptername: Episode 39: After the Cherry Blossom-Filled Entrance Ceremony
item.description: Be kind to the "target" to avoid condemnation? Use your "knowledge of otome games" to live as a commoner in hiding? ...Pathetic. Find a lover better than your fianc√© and have them take revenge? --Leaving your fate in the hands of others is utterly laughable. Friendship and love are unnecessary. If it's for revenge, I'll bow my head, but I will always crush them all later, without fail. This is the story of Gloria, a villainous noblewoman who is wholly dedicated to revenge. Gloria, of the Duke of Caldwell's family, was accused of injuring the saint who had received the crown prince's true love at her graduation party. Then, she was framed for another crime she didn't commit and was executed. She died cursing everything in this world that had wronged her, but when she woke up, she was ten years old again, revived. At the same time, a ghost from another world appeared, saying, "This is the world of otome games, and Gloria is a villainous lady." But instead of ignoring it, she made the ghost submit and decided to live her second life solely for revenge. <+> Tn: If you want to see more chapter of this story, please join my¬†Patreon, for $5 each month, you can read all of the available chapter. Patreon Account: patreon.com/LuoJiyu

item.title: Clap
item.description: Jaemin went for an interview after hearing about a cleaning part-time job at the dentist's office. The doctor he met there, Lee Hyun, was extremely neat. "Are you an omega?" Why is he asking if I'm an omega? Jaemin, who is not good at his job and lacks awareness, but is kind, becomes a cleaner on the day of the interview. The next day when Jaemin goes to the dentist's office, he stutters at the cold tone of Lee Hyun, which is different from yesterday. "I'm a cleaner... part-time job. Temporary work. Three hours a day, twenty thousand won per hour." "I told you this morning. The newly hired cleaning part-timer is so cute." "Oh. Cleaning." The only difference in appearance is the presence or absence of glasses between the twin brothers Ihyun and Ichan. Jaemin, unaware that he has fallen into their trap, works diligently, but soon realizes that something is wrong. "I want to go home. Please let me go." #OmegaBus #Obsession #LightBus #Dominance #Escape #OneTwoThree #HighRank

item.title: Double Junk
item.description: "I'll pay a high price," said Seokju, the boss of the Taeho faction, to the crippled gang member Ajin, marking the beginning of their relationship born out of a misunderstanding one night. "Like you have a leg disease. I have insomnia. Shall we help each other as patients?" Using Seokju's insomnia as an excuse, Ajin fell asleep in his embrace, becoming accustomed to his body temperature. "I want to work at your place until I die." "Then just stay here. Here, in my room, sit on my knees. Let me bring the world to this room. But doubts keep sprouting, despite sealing the cracks of happiness." "Ajin, you can't leave this room until you've paid off all your debts." Now, this room became Ajin's world, yet he found solace in the fact that Seokju didn't abandon him.

item.title: Red Dot
item.description: "Every day, a recurring hellish dream. Junseong is stuck in a world that feels like an endless loop, much like a roguelike game. It's a cursed world where he struggles every day. Two months have passed since he set foot in the zombie apocalypse world in his dreams. "Ha...." As soon as he woke up, his gaze was instinctively drawn to the internet broadcast that he habitually left on. -A major riot is occurring in some regions due to the current situation... Then, beep! A loud sound announcing a disaster alert echoed in Junseong's head. Unconsciously picking up his phone along with the alarm sound, Junseong couldn't hide his confused expression. [10:44 AM] It was the exact time he had always woken up in his dream. Everything was just like his usual dreams. However, a man he had never seen in his dreams before, Do Hanseo, appeared right in front of Junseong. "I've been wanting to ask you something." "What?" As Junseong was about to reply, he felt a change in Hanseo's gaze. The smile that had been on his lips disappeared. Consequently, Junseong felt a strong, cold, and sharp pressure, as if a dagger was piercing his throat. "Why do you look at me like that?" Feeling the strange pressure, Junseong, who had tightly sealed his lips for a moment, asked instead. "How am I... looking at you?" "...." Instead of an immediate answer, Hanseo just gazed silently. Then, he showed the 'fake smile' he had been holding onto a little while ago. His clothes were too clean, his body had no wounds, and the smell of blood was so strong in comparison. When he took off his clothes, he could be sure. The scent of blood from the man named Do Hanseo was not from his 'clothes' but emanated from him.``

item.title: Reasonable Loss
item.description: *This story contains themes of coercive relationships and uncomfortable subjects. A child was on the way. We loved each other, were happy together, and dreamed of a future as a family. But on the way to the obstetrician to meet the baby, an unexpected accident occurred. Due to the accident, Dokwon didn't open his eyes for a long time, and when he finally came to... "Omega?" He didn't remember me. But I was okay. We loved each other more than anything. I believed without a doubt that we could return to that time. Dokwon's words hurt, but I could endure it. I could bear it. "You'll regret this." "Me? What will I regret?" "Talking to me like that." "What?" "Treating me poorly. Treating me like a gold digger. Seeing me as an empty-headed omega who only emits pheromones. You'll regret it later." But the world relentlessly pushed us to the edge. And finally, "Let's end this here." "...What?" "Get rid of the baby." "...What did you say?" "Let's end this without causing any more disgrace. Eunsoo Yoo." The end tore us apart. Left standing alone at the end... I fervently wished for death.

item.title: Guide to the Fallen World
item.description: Jeong Yeo-won wakes up from a frozen state. When I opened my eyes, I found myself woke up 500 years later in a world that had already been destroyed. A monster suddenly appears from the gate. 'Esper', a godlike creature who has awakened his powers follow its lead. And the world is completely different from the past. Humans are no longer the masters of the Earth. The Espers, who are supposed to hunt monsters and protect the city, are actually leading the world to further destruction due to their rampage. The 'Guides' that could calm the Espers have already disappeared. But then. "I'm a guide?" The only guide who miraculously woke up in a discarded hibernation capsule. Yeo-won creates a guiding drug that slows down the rampage and distributes it around the world. Thus, the world is one step away from destruction, but now she must protect herself from the espers who seek to find and possess the guide. A drop of water that falls on dry land, Will it be able to moisten the earth, or will it dry up and disappear in the heat.

item.title: Bondage and Marriage
item.description: Noah, a masochist who enjoys pain. One day, due to his father's arbitrary decision, he is forced into an arranged political marriage with a man named Ian Miller... "...Ah, I got it right this time? Yeah, I'll use this for my fianc√©. What of it?" Ian's voice continued soothingly. "Even if I just torment him a little, that young master will run off crying to his daddy. If he's an alpha, he might even be traumatized." In this world, is this a dream or reality? Is my fianc√© now buying adult toys from my favorite club just to torment me? That sounded far more alluring and sweet than any love confession Noah had ever heard. Noah immediately changed the resolve he had just made to not marry Ian Miller. Someone who would even pluck a star from the sky for him is nothing special, and someone who hates him is nothing special either, but someone who will torment him is most welcome. This marriage must happen! It absolutely must! The delusion and love between a lovable, cute masochist and a lone, serious bad guy!

item.title: My Husband Became the Most Powerful Minister
item.description: At the princess's banquet, in a secluded hall, Helan Ci pressed her palm against the wall, encountering the equally disheveled newly crowned top scholar Lu Wuyou. One was as delicate as a willow, the other had a flushed face. Their eyes met, and in each other's gaze, they saw a glimmer of despair. "I'll go first..." "I'll head that way..." However, what was even more despairing was the sound of the princess's maid and the second prince's attendant searching for them not far away. Helan Ci bit her lip: "What don't you just go to the princess?" Lu Wuyou endured: "I think the second prince is not bad either." Helan Ci: "If we keep talking, we'll only end up hurting each other!" Lu Wuyou closed his eyes: "Then let it be a mutual destruction." Helan Ci: "‚Ä¶?" A night later, their innocence was lost, and they were forced into marriage. Yet, with strong enemies lurking, this marriage was extremely difficult. On one side, there was the second prince, eagerly awaiting her husband's demise, and on the other, the princess, watching her with cold eyes. Helan Ci asked, ‚Äú‚Ä¶Can you handle this?‚Äù Lu Wuyou replied, ‚ÄúEven if I can‚Äôt, I have to. Who told me to marry you‚Äî I‚Äôm going to be a powerful minister. I can‚Äôt fall here.‚Äù Helan Ci, ‚ÄúThen do your best! I‚Äôm counting on you!‚Äù Lu Wuyou, ‚Äú‚Ä¶?‚Äù Years later, Lu Wuyou became the Prime Minister, holding the highest position among officials, wielding immense power across the land, and reflecting on the past. A student asked him how he had come this far. Prime Minister Lu thought to himself that as long as one marries a wife of extraordinary beauty, often coveted by others, it would always inspire one to strive to make progress. ===== Two chapters will be free every week (Sat & Sunday). If you enjoy this story consider rate and review this at NovelUpdates, also support me at ko-fi

item.title: My Bloody Valentine
item.description: ‚Äª This work contains immoral subject matter, violent acts, and descriptions of coercive relationships, among other things. Additionally, the settings, backgrounds, and characters in the work are all fictional. Please keep this in mind while enjoying the story. Han's simple daily life working part-time at a convenience store is suddenly turned upside down. "Your debt amounts to a total of one hundred million and seven thousand." With a timid and fearful personality, Han is unwittingly drawn into the world of the 'Tasenda' club to repay the massive debt he incurred. There, he meets Jang Taesin, a man who is a perfect fit for the depths of darkness. From the moment Taesin laid eyes on Han, he was inexplicably drawn to him and began to obsessively pursue him, offering a proposal to keep him from escaping. "I'll stay by your side only until I get tired of you. Once I'm tired of your body, I'll consider your debt paid and let you go." "How long will it take for you to get tired of me?" "About twenty times, and I won't get tired." However, instead of getting tired, the thirst only grew stronger. He wanted to see, touch, and possess him. Once he had his body, he found himself desiring his heart as well. "Why don't I ever get to see that cheap smile of yours?" "You'll never see me smile in front of you, even if I die." Taesin couldn't understand why Han hated him so much, and Han couldn't fathom Taesin's obsession with him. Thus, the tangled threads of a complex relationship began to weave between the two, as distant from the end of the world as they could be. Can these two people, who seem so far apart from the rest of the world, really be together?

item.title: Zion's Garden
item.description: Jung-won, born the son of a prostitute and now a doctor. Zion, molded into a top star by his father from birth. After losing his mother, Jung-won loses his purpose as a doctor, until an offer arrives: keep Zion alive until the end of his world tour. "Don‚Äôt think of it as being a doctor; think of it as making money." He vowed that after three months, it wouldn‚Äôt matter if Zion swallowed a bottle of sleeping pills or slit his wrists in the bathtub. But‚Äî ‚ÄúNo doctor gives drugs to a patient like that.‚Äù ‚ÄúYou said you weren‚Äôt a doctor.‚Äù The moment I saw my fallen angel, drugged and limp in the sprawling castle hidden deep in the mountains, I knew I shouldn‚Äôt have come here. ‚ÄúA doctor can‚Äôt turn away poor Zion.‚Äù ‚ÄúI refuse. I refuse‚Ä¶ I absolutely refuse, Kim Zion.‚Äù My patient. My Zion. He knew from the start. He knew I would never be able to turn him away. If only I‚Äôd known it would end like this, would I have been kinder to you?

item.title: I Am Being Mistaken for a Genius Strategist
item.description: I am not a Genius. I am not a Strategist. That is all a misunderstanding.

item.title: I Am Being Mistaken for a Genius Strategist
item.description: I am not a Genius. I am not a Strategist. That is all a misunderstanding.

item.title: The Final Task of the Forsaken Saint: A Command to Marry the Barbarian Count
item.description: "A Marriage in Name Only, Yet 'My Wife' and 'My Husband' Are Too Perfect!" From a young age, Rubel was called a saint due to her bond with the spirits and her immense magical prowess, drafted into countless battlefields. Yet when peace was finally achieved, her reward was an annulled engagement to the prince and a royal command: oversee the haunted Forest of Death, teeming with monstrous beasts, and marry the so-called ‚ÄúBarbarian Count,‚Äù a margrave of the frontier. The Barbarian Count was said to be a man who spent his days battling monstrous creatures, obsessed with wealth, and reputed to be so terrifying in appearance that a mere glance could make someone faint. But Rubel thought, Isn‚Äôt this a chance to fulfill my long-held dream of owning my own home? After punching the prince goodbye, she set off alone for her final task, armed with just her staff and a single trunk, to wed the margrave of the frontier. However, what awaited her was not the monstrous figure she had expected, but a breathtakingly handsome man with a villainous look that could make anyone weak at the knees. What was meant to be a marriage in name only soon proved otherwise‚Äîher husband was kind, his domain awe-inspiring, and...

item.title: I Want to Avoid the Bad Ending
item.description: [ED 4: Miserable Death] The moment the ending of the escape room game appeared, I found myself inside the player's body. I managed to gather the NPCs, just trying to survive for now, but‚Ä¶ "Hey. We finally meet. Let‚Äôs get along, Jaeyi." Jeong Haeyoon‚Äî a character who wasn‚Äôt supposed to exist. The instant he joined the group, a new system message popped up. ...Wait, I have to raise his affection to get the happy ending? After several attempts to increase his affection with words I didn‚Äôt even mean, Jeong Haeyoon, an anomaly who didn‚Äôt originally exist in this game, began to gradually reveal his suspicious true colors‚Ä¶ "You should really ask nicely, Jaeyi. Don‚Äôt you think?" ‚ñ∂ Ask. ‚ñ∂ Don‚Äôt ask.

item.title: The Wind Heard Her Confession
item.description: Synopsis:¬†   Lin Yuran never would have thought that the client sitting across from her, forcing them both to work together, was the high school classmate she had rejected long ago, Chi Ye.   The two maintained a distant yet courteous relationship, keeping their distance as they worked together.   However, Lin Yuran gradually felt something wasn't quite right.   For example, why did this man insist on her working at his company instead of her own studio? And moreover, how come her office just so happened to be directly opposite his?   Another instance, when Lin Yuran accepted a ride in another man's Rolls-Royce Phantom, Chi Ye only sighed, "I thought I'd never get to ride a luxury car like this in my life."   The very next day, Chi Ye's car changed to a Bentley, then Bugatti, followed by Koenigsegg... Another time, Lin Yuran accidentally stumbled upon Chi Ye's Baidu profile and discovered that her favorite lollipop factory was registered under his name.   But rumor had it that the factory closed five years ago, and that some mysterious big shot loved eating these lollipops, so he bought the factory and continued production regardless of profit or loss, no matter what the situation.   Numerous clues led Lin Yuran to suspect‚Äî   Chi Ye still liked her?   Little did she know, even their second encounter was part of his plan.   Yet Chi Ye remained unaware that on that sweltering afternoon six years ago, Lin Yuran had quietly watched his lonely figure from afar and murmured softly, "If we meet again someday, I hope I can respond to you."   That year, only the wind heard her confession.

item.title: After Transmigrating, I Married the Male Lead‚Äôs Sister (GL)
item.description: Synopsis: Li Suimei knew that Qin Qing would disdain to attend her engagement ceremony with Qin Zhan. After all, as a vicious female supporting character, Li Suimei‚Äôs role as a stepping stone for the male and female leads was almost over. Why would Qin Qing come to help her? Li Suimei chuckled bitterly. She had heard rumors about Qin Qing being very protective of her loved ones, but she didn't know who had spread those rumors. ‚Äî‚ÄîAt the engagement ceremony, Qin Qing, who was originally not supposed to attend, suddenly appeared. Wearing a snow-white wedding dress, she stood in the position that should have belonged to the male protagonist and said expressionlessly, "Now, you are my wife." Li Suimei: "..." Didn't this person seem indifferent towards her just yesterday? ‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢ Small Theater: Qin Qing pinched Li Suimei's wrist, her gaze fierce, "Back then, I always thought, you invited me to dinner and movies, stayed up late with me to go through documents, hugged my arm and cried, calling me 'sister.' Whenever I got angry, you would get nervous, and you even walked in and out of my room in your pajamas. If that wasn't love, what was it?" Li Suimei looked confused, "When did I bent?" Qin Qing: "..."

item.title: Giving Interstellar Players a Horror Ghost Game Shock
item.description:
Ye Yuxi has lived in the interstellar world for 20 years and has just remembered that she is a proud transmigrator. Before her transmigration, she was an avid fan of horror games; after transmigrating, she coincidentally became a university student majoring in game design. In this interstellar world, where everyone is a tough, bloodthirsty warrior, violent and gory games are all the rage‚Äîmost notably, games about hunting insectoid aliens and zombies. A search across the star network reveals no concept of supernatural horror games at all! What does this mean? It means there is a vast untapped blue ocean of opportunity! With this in mind, Ye Yuxi rolls up her sleeves and decides to give the interstellar residents a little shock with horror female ghost! She launches Campus Nightmare, and interstellar players are terrified: ‚ÄúI‚Äôve never been this scared of school!‚Äù She releases Residential Area Battle Royale, and interstellar players cry: ‚ÄúThis isn‚Äôt the battle royale I‚Äôve played before!‚Äù She rolls out A Loving Home, and interstellar players go crazy: ‚ÄúWhere‚Äôs my quilt barrier? Is there any safe place in this world?!‚Äù Later, after receiving the 10,086th complaint message from a terrified player, Ye Yuxi calmly accepts an interview: ‚ÄúAt first, I just wanted to make a small game I‚Äôd enjoy. I never expected it to be so popular, so I ended up making a few more‚Ä¶‚Äù Players who were scared out of their wits: ‚ÄúWe thank you!‚Äù  
If you‚Äôre enjoying the story, please consider:
  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on¬†NovelUpdates!

item.title: Transmigrated into the Villain's Cannon Fodder Ex-Wife (Transmigrated into a Book)
item.description:
Lin Chu, an engineering student, was following a novel and found the villain character especially compelling. When she read the part where the villain was forced to marry a manipulative woman during his downfall, Lin Chu couldn‚Äôt help but criticize the green tea character. Who would have expected that she‚Äôd black out, only to become that very same troublesome woman who regretted her marriage to the villain on their wedding day and ultimately got herself killed? Lin Chu: ‚Äú‚Ä¶‚Äù Stay calm, don‚Äôt panic. Looking at the villainous husband, injured and returning from the battlefield, Lin Chu thought she had found her chance to escape her tragic fate by clinging to his leg for survival‚Ä¶

item.title: After Marrying the Disabled Prince (BG)
item.description:
The fourth prince, Pei Yuan, was convicted overnight, falling from the title of the infamous King of Jibei to a paralyzed cripple. The Duke of Rong‚Äôs household was unwilling to marry off their legitimate daughter, so the unloved Bao Ning was sent as a substitute bride. The fourth prince's residence was nothing more than a broken-down courtyard on the capital's outskirts, covered in cobwebs and deserted. Pei Yuan, with a crippled leg, lay on the bed, filthy all over, glaring at her coldly with eyes full of vigilance and disgust. Bao Ning, however, was delighted. Here, there were no scheming sisters or harsh mistresses. She could do whatever she wanted‚Äîraising chickens, planting vegetables and the two could live well enough. As for this seemingly difficult-to-get-along-with disabled husband... Bao Ning squatted beside Pei Yuan with a bowl of rice, looking at him eagerly. ‚ÄúI gave you all the meat. You should be a little nicer to me.‚Äù In the struggle for the throne, the brothers turned against each other, and in one scheme, Pei Yuan was severely injured. When he lay in bed with a crippled leg, he thought his life was over. Unexpectedly, his newly married little wife suddenly broke into his life, fragrant and smiling, like a beam of light piercing through the mist. How could he bear to only treat her a little better? At their wedding, the dowry consisted of only three sacks of millet. Now, he offers the kingdom itself, just to make her smile. Main characters: Ji Bao Ning and Pei Yuan Warnings:
  1. The female lead is gentle and cute, skilled in cooking and crafting, with no scheming, and not a "strong woman" type.
  2. The male lead can recover.
  3. The male lead has a rugged, bandit-like personality, not a gentle-type prince.

item.title: The Second Son of The Marquis Runs Away from Home ~ Lacking Talent, He Abandons Everything and Becomes an Adventurer ~
item.description: "I can't take it anymore..." Constantly compared to his prodigious elder brother, who is hailed as a genius, Serk strives relentlessly to earn recognition. However, unable to bear it any longer, Serk reaches his breaking point and runs away not only from home but from the country itself. He becomes an adventurer in the land he escapes to, but...

item.title: After Retirement, Living a Stud Life in Another World
item.description: After drinking too much at my retirement celebration, I woke up to find myself inexplicably transformed into a beautiful young boy in another world. In this world where magic reigns supreme, there's a catch ‚Äì only women can use magic. The value of men lies in their ability to produce magically powerful offspring, recognized only through the demanding role of a 'stud' in a challenging setting. Somehow, when I engage in procreation, both the children and their mothers gain peculiar powers. Before I knew it, my surroundings were filled with women. Is this some kind of cheat?

item.title: The Goddess Granted Me the [Hatching] Skill and Somehow I Became the Strongest Tamer, Commanding Mythical and Divine Beasts
item.description: Klaus, who was on the verge of death due to a high fever, met a goddess and was specially granted the ‚ÄòHatching‚Äô skill. When he regained consciousness, he found himself lying in bed surrounded by his parents and his younger sister, Celia. Later, after various events, Klaus became an adventurer and discovered a large egg deep in the forest. When he hatched it, a phoenix emerged. For some reason, a familiar contract was automatically formed, along with the bonus of being able to use some of the familiar's abilities. As Klaus fully manifested the true power of ‚ÄòHatching‚Äô, he gradually began to attract attention among adventurers and eventually caught the eye of the nation...

item.title: Osratida
item.description: After a bus accident, Go Shin-hee narrowly saves Ha Gyo-jin's life. Six years later, Gyo-jin, now a director at Ha Imbel Hotel, requests Shin-hee‚Äôs company on a business trip to Japan. The story explores whether Shin-hee can help Gyo-jin break free from his curse, all while they navigate a complex and supernatural relationship. ‚ÄúYou just need to stay with me. I actually see ghosts quite well and am even better at driving them away.‚Äù Will Gyo-jin be able to fix his cursed fate? He quietly asks the determined Shin-hee as he walks past him. "‚Ä¶Do you know how to use talismans?"

item.title: Global Descent to Sky Islands: Getting a God-level Talent from the Start
item.description: All humanity from Blue Star descended into a world without land, where the sky is filled with floating islands. Everyone must choose a class, start anew here, and strive to survive! Starting with a small, broken piece of land, to survive, one must land on these mysterious islands, search for resources, expand their territory, and then build their own sky island. Upon entering the game, Han Xing unexpectedly activated a unique hidden SSS Grade talent, ‚ÄòGod-level Craftsman‚Äô. He never fails in crafting anything; everything he crafts turns from tr*sh to legendary. [Successfully Crafted a Blunt Wooden Stick, Quality ‚Äì Legendary, Property: Never breaks, with a 100% Stun effect.] [Successfully Crafted a Rusted Iron Sword, Quality ‚Äì Epic, Property: Break any defenses, with a 100% Tetan*s effect.] ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ As the survivors step out to explore the outside world, mysteries begin to surface. Lost civilizations, the shattered truths of the world‚Ä¶ When a terrifying natural disaster strikes, hundreds of millions of survivors gaze at the huge island in the sky, covered with Mythical-grade engineering tools, and almost simultaneously exclaim, ‚ÄúLook, that‚Äôs the man who withstands the calamity!‚Äù

item.title: The Three baby mining brothers
item.description: This work contains themes of gaslighting, coercion, and other morally challenging topics. Please be aware of this when engaging with the story. --- The orphanage, engulfed in flames, was the only home Yeo-reum had ever known. Even as the fire raged, Yeo-reum ran back inside, desperate to find the director, only to encounter two unfamiliar brothers. ‚ÄúHelp‚Ä¶ please, help me‚Ä¶‚Äù ‚ÄúCall someone. They just left a kid behind.‚Äù ‚ÄúBut with a face like that, it‚Äôd be a waste.‚Äù When Yeo-reum woke up, he found himself in the brothers‚Äô home, unsure if he had been rescued or kidnapped. With nowhere else to go, he came to see them as his saviors and began a new life. The concept of "family" felt foreign and complicated to Yeo-reum. But as he lived with the brothers, he slowly redefined what family meant, pouring his unwavering affection into them‚Äîunaware that his devotion only fueled their underlying unease. As time passed, their relationship grew into something inexplicably intense and tangled.

item.title: I Have been Reincarnated As a Lazy, Arrogant Noble, but When I Destroyed The Scenario Through Effort, I Became The Most Powerful With Extraordinary Magical Power
item.description: "Weiss Fancent" A debased villainous noble with an arrogant attitude, embodying true evil. Before I realized it, I had been reincarnated as that man. This despicable scumbag, who despised effort and was beyond redemption, would eventually become a minion of the Demon Lord and be deceived, only to be executed. "Noblesse Oblige." This is the aristocratic academy game that I love. But... "I'll shatter that kind of scenario." I will alter the path of destruction. As I started making efforts, with the help of those around me, my stats began to rise, and I enrolled in the academy, the stage of this story. However, it is there that I realize. "Am I... too strong?" This is the story of a man reincarnated as a lazy noble, who breaks the scenario through relentless effort and becomes the most formidable.

item.title: The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
item.description: The man I had a drunken one-night stand with turned out to be the male lead from the original story. The issue? This ridiculously rich, handsome, and incredibly fit younger guy is set to start a war in two years. And me? I need to get out of here, obviously. So, I said, "I only liked you for your money." "Is that so? I have plenty of money. Does that mean you like me a lot, then?" He leaned in, planting a light kiss on my cheek, then asked in a low voice, "Besides the money, what else do you like about me? Yesterday, it seemed like you were quite into my face and body too." "What?" "I'm guessing you‚Äôre in love with me..." "Ack!" Instinctively, I screamed to block his love confession. But Kyle, as if he'd just realized something, grinned brightly. "I get it now, noona. You don‚Äôt want to hear me say I love you, right?" Exactly, that‚Äôs it! "In that case, I‚Äôll express it in a way you like better than words." With that, Kyle tugged his tie loose and stepped closer to me. No! I don't want you to express it with your body either!

item.title: A Moment Too Late (GL)
item.description: Synopsis: „ÄêChasing Wife Crematorium„Äë In her youth, Shu Yubai fell in love with a girl. She confessed to her, and the girl, rather conflicted, said: "Don't be like this, we still need to be friends." When they grew up, Shu Yubai, who had been friends with the girl for many years, decided to give up on her and find someone else. As a result-- During a blind date: The blind date partner whispered, "The girl at the next table has been staring at us. What's her deal?" During a date: "Xiao Shu, don't you feel like there's a girl secretly following us?" While booking a room: Shu Yubai held the room card to open the door and found the girl who claimed to be her lifelong friend curled up on the bed in a slip dress, her clear black and white eyes quietly looking at her... #Pretending to be straight is fun for a while, chasing a wife is a crematorium.

item.title: The Tyrant's Happy Ending
item.description: BL fantasy novel set in a Western-style Omegaverse. It follows the story of Lyle Beltimore, a duke who rises to power after being betrayed by his first love, Yernen Helio, a prince who later becomes a tyrant. Lyle returns to the capital after years of war and finds Yernen dead. However, Yernen reincarnates into the body of Prince Fortnum, Lyle‚Äôs new fianc√©, and must now navigate his second life, torn between his past regrets and the possibility of a new future with Lyle. Themes of love, betrayal, revenge, and redemption are central to the plot, with intense emotional struggles and a chance at a happy ending in Yernen‚Äôs second life.

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.nameextend: The Village Girl Supporting Role Will Not Be a Cannon Fodder 003
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless‚Äîcapable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder's script, Sheng Nuan is terrified... Later: A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: "Nuan Nuan, you're not allowed to go anywhere except by my side..." The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with blood: "Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?" The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: "Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon." The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: "Nuan Nuan, it‚Äôs your choice‚Äîkill me, or save me." Sheng Nuan became even more panicked...

item.title: After Rebirth, I Married my Archenemy
item.description:
Before her death, Qun Qing hated the powerful official Lu Huating the most. She hated him for assisting the new emperor and for being cunning and insidious. She thought about him day and night, and tried her best to defeat him, but she was not his match. In the end, she became a cannon fodder in his hands. After Qun Qing died, she saw the princess of the fallen country that she had protected with her life, crying and leaning on the new emperor's chest: "Qung Qing is dead, what should I do?" The new emperor kissed her: "You will be fine, just love me." The princess burst into tears, like a delicate flower under the rain: "Qung Qing is dead, Your Majesty is all I have left." When she opened his eyes, Qun Qing had woke up three years ago. She stood up, woodenly packed her bags, and regardless of the princess's obstruction, took off her jade crown and walked away, dropped her female official's wooden seal, turned around and left, leaving behind ten years of careful planning and treading on thin ice. Restore the country? Pfft, restore it my foot. ------ The powerful minister Lu Huating is deeply cunning, ruthless, and dominates the power struggles of the court. Tired of the ugly nature of human hearts, his life has become dull and unfulfilling. Looking back on his life, the only thing that left an impression was a female officer, a spy, whom he poisoned to death at the age of twenty-six. For the love of the princess, she sacrificed his life for the country and schemed against him several times. In the end, she knelt in front of the Summer Palace, her facial expression remaining unchanged, with a look of resentment in her eyes, and sighed with a smile, "The king who wins is the ruler, and the one who loses is the defeated," before raising her head and drinking to the last drop. Blood poured from her lips, a thin layer of vivid red. When he opened his eyes again, Lu Huating returned to his twenty-three-year-old self. Lu Huating looked at the documents under his command, and felt even more bored. He put down his brush and leaned on the back of the chair: "Where is the female official accompanying Crown Princess?" "... She resigned. She asked me to tell My lord that she would not fight anymore." Lu Huating was silent for a while, and curled his lips coldly: "She said she won't fight, so the fight is over?"
If you‚Äôre enjoying the story, please consider:
  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on¬†NovelUpdates!

item.title: Zion's Garden
item.description: Jung-won, born the son of a prostitute and now a doctor. Zion, molded into a top star by his father from birth. After losing his mother, Jung-won loses his purpose as a doctor, until an offer arrives: keep Zion alive until the end of his world tour. "Don‚Äôt think of it as being a doctor; think of it as making money." He vowed that after three months, it wouldn‚Äôt matter if Zion swallowed a bottle of sleeping pills or slit his wrists in the bathtub. But‚Äî ‚ÄúNo doctor gives drugs to a patient like that.‚Äù ‚ÄúYou said you weren‚Äôt a doctor.‚Äù The moment I saw my fallen angel, drugged and limp in the sprawling castle hidden deep in the mountains, I knew I shouldn‚Äôt have come here. ‚ÄúA doctor can‚Äôt turn away poor Zion.‚Äù ‚ÄúI refuse. I refuse‚Ä¶ I absolutely refuse, Kim Zion.‚Äù My patient. My Zion. He knew from the start. He knew I would never be able to turn him away. If only I‚Äôd known it would end like this, would I have been kinder to you?

item.title: The Unspoken Vow
item.description:
Î∂àÍ∞ÄÌòº means incompatible. In the prospects of matrimony, it means unmarriageable.

Summary‚Äì

Kang Yeon-hong, the noble daughter of Minister Kang, is no longer the cherished young lady she once was, her aristocratic status now a mere facade. One day, she is abducted and sold to the renowned noble, Kwon Gu-yong, in Hanyang, under the condition that she rears a child for the prestigious Kwon family. Facing a humiliating fate, she attempts to escape, only to be stopped by a man who resembles an old lover, holding her tightly. This was the man who once loved her with his life, the one who supposedly died during the tragic fall of his household. The man shook his head in annoyance. It seemed like he was disinterested in her petty grievances, clicking his tongue, as if in contempt. His gaze darkened with disdain. "I don‚Äôt know who you think I am, let me make one thing clear." He pried her hands away and spoke. "I‚Äôve never met a woman like you."  

Character Guide

Male Lead: Heo Nan-woo A guest and a resident at the household of Minister Kang. Despite his lowly social status, he was taken in as a guest and a master of Go due to his innate genius at the game. Having lived a life devoid of desires, he‚Äôs met with a fatal crisis when he begins to covet Young Lady Yeon-hong.¬† After five years, he is reborn in Hanyang (present-day Seoul) as Kwon Si-gyeong, the eldest son of one of the most prestigious families in the capital. He had confidence that he had completely forgotten his past, but it was mere arrogance. What lingered could be a thirst for revenge or a tangled mix of love and hatred. Female Lead: Kang Yeon-hong A cherished noble lady who was raised like a precious gem. Strong-willed and stubborn, she‚Äôs always had her way. Having lived a life of luxury, she suddenly finds herself agonising over an intense longing for a lowly household guest ‚Äî without even realizing it could be love. At the happiest moment of her life, she loses everything. As she writhes in one hell, another abyss beckons her. "Hate me all you want. I will never let you go. Never." A story of love, hatred, and revenge that transcends social status. Relatable quotes: "Even a dog doesn‚Äôt bite the hand that raised it. How much more so should a person repay kindness?"

item.title: A Forest flowing with Milk and Honey
item.description: In a modern setting infused with elements of mystery and suspense, "A Forest Flowing with Milk and Honey" centers around the complex relationship between Saeteo Oh, a powerful and charismatic acting chairman of Baekmu Construction, and Baek Woorim, the company's young and affectionate heiress. Saeteo is a competent, tsundere man known for his sharp intuition and fierce protectiveness, qualities that make him unrivaled in handling both business matters and supernatural threats. He has been watching over Woorim since her childhood, rescuing her from dangerous situations and guarding her from harm. Woorim, who has unrequited feelings for Saeteo, trusts him implicitly and finds comfort in his care, even as she often finds herself entangled in bizarre and mysterious incidents. Though shy and innocent, she is honest about her desires and frequently relies on Saeteo for support. As they navigate a web of secrets, vengeful spirits, and corporate intrigues, their bond grows deeper, revealing hidden affections and possessive desires that neither can ignore.

item.title: The Final Task of the Forsaken Saint: A Command to Marry the Barbarian Count
item.description: "A Marriage in Name Only, Yet 'My Wife' and 'My Husband' Are Too Perfect!" From a young age, Rubel was called a saint due to her bond with the spirits and her immense magical prowess, drafted into countless battlefields. Yet when peace was finally achieved, her reward was an annulled engagement to the prince and a royal command: oversee the haunted Forest of Death, teeming with monstrous beasts, and marry the so-called ‚ÄúBarbarian Count,‚Äù a margrave of the frontier. The Barbarian Count was said to be a man who spent his days battling monstrous creatures, obsessed with wealth, and reputed to be so terrifying in appearance that a mere glance could make someone faint. But Rubel thought, Isn‚Äôt this a chance to fulfill my long-held dream of owning my own home? After punching the prince goodbye, she set off alone for her final task, armed with just her staff and a single trunk, to wed the margrave of the frontier. However, what awaited her was not the monstrous figure she had expected, but a breathtakingly handsome man with a villainous look that could make anyone weak at the knees. What was meant to be a marriage in name only soon proved otherwise‚Äîher husband was kind, his domain awe-inspiring, and...

item.title: The Male Lead's Harem Belongs to Me (GL)
item.description: Synopsis: Jiang Han died from staying up too late reading a novel, and after her death, she found herself transported into the ancient melodramatic romance novel she had been reading. The male lead is a cold and domineering prince, and the female lead is the prince's long-cherished "white moonlight". Unfortunately, the white moonlight has a lowly status, and the prince's mother disapproves. The male lead goes to great lengths, enduring countless melodramatic events, heart-wrenching and physically exhausting, ultimately winning the heart of his beloved and achieving a happy ending. And Jiang Han is one of the cannon fodder female characters who, out of jealousy, targeted the male lead's white moonlight. Jiang Han, who traveled through time, said: "No way, I just want to be a salted fish and play mahjong every day." So when the male lead said: "I want to marry my white moonlight." Jiang Han: Marry! You must marry! The gifts are all ready. The male lead said: "She is timid and frail. As the princess, you should take good care of her." Jiang Han: Take care! Must take care of !Tomorrow, I'll have her live next to me! The male lead said: "She's too considerate. She won't speak up about her needs, so you should be more accommodating to her." Jiang Han: Move! Must yield! Tomorrow, I will divorce you and give the title of princess to her! ‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢ The next day, Jiang Han indeed handed him a divorce letter. The male lead, feeling complicated, signed it, but Jiang Han happily prepared to leave. Just as she reached the gate of the royal mansion, a group of concubines led by Bai Yueguang blocked her way. Bai Yueguang: Sister Han, don't go. Would you stay? A group of concubines: Yeah, yeah, please don't leave. Jiang Han showed a troubled expression, and the male lead's heart was filled with joy. Just as he was about to say a few words of persuasion, he saw Jiang Han decisively shake her head. The male lead thought it was a pity. Before he could catch his breath, he saw the person he held dear, his "white moonlight," take out a divorce agreement and coldly say to him, "Sign it. I want to leave with Sister Han." The male lead stared wide-eyed in disbelief, a mouthful of old blood choked in his chest. However, the next moment, his group of concubines gritted their teeth and said to Bai Yueguang: "Weiwei, you are being too ungrateful. Why did you prepare the divorce papers all by yourself without telling us?" #My harem seems to have turned into my princess's, what should I do# #Is it too late to regret now# One-on-one [highlight this], before the divorce, they were just pure revolutionary comrades and good friends. After the divorce, there will be romantic developments.

item.title: Transmigrated into the Villain's Cannon Fodder Ex-Wife (Transmigrated into a Book)
item.description:
Lin Chu, an engineering student, was following a novel and found the villain character especially compelling. When she read the part where the villain was forced to marry a manipulative woman during his downfall, Lin Chu couldn‚Äôt help but criticize the green tea character. Who would have expected that she‚Äôd black out, only to become that very same troublesome woman who regretted her marriage to the villain on their wedding day and ultimately got herself killed? Lin Chu: ‚Äú‚Ä¶‚Äù Stay calm, don‚Äôt panic. Looking at the villainous husband, injured and returning from the battlefield, Lin Chu thought she had found her chance to escape her tragic fate by clinging to his leg for survival‚Ä¶

item.title: When I started High School, My Childhood Friend, who had suddenly become distant and cold, was harassed by a stranger. I stepped in to help, and as a result, from the following day, My Childhood Friend's behavior became unusual.
item.description: "Right after being cheated on by my girlfriend, I ended up helping my childhood friend... One morning, still unable to recover from the shock of my girlfriend's betrayal, I was on the train when I noticed Shizune Aizawa, my childhood friend who had suddenly become distant when we entered high school, being harassed. I, Natsuki Sawatari, stepped in to help, and from that day forward, the distance between Shizune and me began to close, becoming even closer than our relationship had ever been before. This is the story of two people who once drifted apart, finding their way back to each other and growing closer again."

item.title: The Second Son of The Marquis Runs Away from Home ~ Lacking Talent, He Abandons Everything and Becomes an Adventurer ~
item.description: "I can't take it anymore..." Constantly compared to his prodigious elder brother, who is hailed as a genius, Serk strives relentlessly to earn recognition. However, unable to bear it any longer, Serk reaches his breaking point and runs away not only from home but from the country itself. He becomes an adventurer in the land he escapes to, but...

item.title: After Retirement, Living a Stud Life in Another World
item.description: After drinking too much at my retirement celebration, I woke up to find myself inexplicably transformed into a beautiful young boy in another world. In this world where magic reigns supreme, there's a catch ‚Äì only women can use magic. The value of men lies in their ability to produce magically powerful offspring, recognized only through the demanding role of a 'stud' in a challenging setting. Somehow, when I engage in procreation, both the children and their mothers gain peculiar powers. Before I knew it, my surroundings were filled with women. Is this some kind of cheat?

item.title: The Goddess Granted Me the [Hatching] Skill and Somehow I Became the Strongest Tamer, Commanding Mythical and Divine Beasts
item.description: Klaus, who was on the verge of death due to a high fever, met a goddess and was specially granted the ‚ÄòHatching‚Äô skill. When he regained consciousness, he found himself lying in bed surrounded by his parents and his younger sister, Celia. Later, after various events, Klaus became an adventurer and discovered a large egg deep in the forest. When he hatched it, a phoenix emerged. For some reason, a familiar contract was automatically formed, along with the bonus of being able to use some of the familiar's abilities. As Klaus fully manifested the true power of ‚ÄòHatching‚Äô, he gradually began to attract attention among adventurers and eventually caught the eye of the nation...

item.title: The Young Marquis Regrets Too Late
item.description: Jiang Jingchun, who was the cherished daughter of a minister‚Äôs household, grew up as a true pampered young miss. She could have whatever she desired, except for one thing: her cousin, Gu Huaisheng, the young marquis of a marquis‚Äô residence. Gu Huaisheng, who was the son of a marquis‚Äô household, was like snow on the eaves or the moon outside the window‚Äîelegant, untouchable, and the most outstanding young man in his family. He was far beyond anyone‚Äôs reach. Jiang Jingchun tried everything to win his favour. She found out the type of person he seemed to admire and transformed herself from an outspoken and willful young lady into someone obedient and meek in his presence. Yet no matter how hard she tried, Gu Huaisheng would barely spare her a glance. The frustrated and desperate Jiang Jingchun followed a terrible idea from her closest friend. One day, while he wasn‚Äôt paying attention, she leaned in to kiss his cheek. But just as she moved closer, Gu Huaisheng turned his head, and their lips accidentally met‚Ä¶ The soft touch of their lips startled her, but before Jiang Jingchun could even blush, Gu Huaisheng shoved her away harshly. With a cold and angry glare, he spat, ‚ÄúShameless,‚Äù and strode away without a backward glance. That one push left Jiang Jingchun completely stunned and shattered her girlish infatuation into pieces. <hr /> Misfortunes never come singly. On the same day, news arrived at the minister‚Äôs household: the true daughter of their family had been found. Jiang Jingchun had lived as the family‚Äôs treasured daughter for over a decade. Only then did she learn that she was, in fact, a fake daughter. At the true daughter‚Äôs formal recognition banquet, Jiang Jingchun witnessed something that cut deeper than anything before. Gu Huaisheng, who had always been cold and distant to her, now stood before the true daughter and treated her gently and warmly. He could smile, she realised, but not for her. From beginning to end, she had been nothing but a colossal joke. Gu Huaisheng was cruel. She swore she would never like him again. <hr /> After the true daughter of the Jiang family returned, Jiang Jingchun‚Äôs heart turned to ashes. She calmly accepted the marriage that the Jiang family arranged for her. But before the betrothal was finalised, Gu Huaisheng appeared at her family residence‚Äôs doorstep. On a day of heavy rain, he stood in the downpour under an umbrella, gripping her delicate wrist and refusing to let go. He said, ‚ÄúHe is not a good man.‚Äù Jiang Jingchun laughed and shook off his hand. ‚ÄúHe is still far kinder than you, Cousin.‚Äù Under Jiang Jingchun‚Äôs icy gaze, Gu Huaisheng tensed up. A sharp ache spread through his chest. For the first time, the proud and aloof young marquis understood what it truly meant to feel regret.

item.title: Giving Interstellar Players a Horror Ghost Game Shock
item.description:
Ye Yuxi has lived in the interstellar world for 20 years and has just remembered that she is a proud transmigrator. Before her transmigration, she was an avid fan of horror games; after transmigrating, she coincidentally became a university student majoring in game design. In this interstellar world, where everyone is a tough, bloodthirsty warrior, violent and gory games are all the rage‚Äîmost notably, games about hunting insectoid aliens and zombies. A search across the star network reveals no concept of supernatural horror games at all! What does this mean? It means there is a vast untapped blue ocean of opportunity! With this in mind, Ye Yuxi rolls up her sleeves and decides to give the interstellar residents a little shock with horror female ghost! She launches Campus Nightmare, and interstellar players are terrified: ‚ÄúI‚Äôve never been this scared of school!‚Äù She releases Residential Area Battle Royale, and interstellar players cry: ‚ÄúThis isn‚Äôt the battle royale I‚Äôve played before!‚Äù She rolls out A Loving Home, and interstellar players go crazy: ‚ÄúWhere‚Äôs my quilt barrier? Is there any safe place in this world?!‚Äù Later, after receiving the 10,086th complaint message from a terrified player, Ye Yuxi calmly accepts an interview: ‚ÄúAt first, I just wanted to make a small game I‚Äôd enjoy. I never expected it to be so popular, so I ended up making a few more‚Ä¶‚Äù Players who were scared out of their wits: ‚ÄúWe thank you!‚Äù  
If you‚Äôre enjoying the story, please consider:
  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on¬†NovelUpdates!

item.title: The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
item.description: The man I had a drunken one-night stand with turned out to be the male lead from the original story. The issue? This ridiculously rich, handsome, and incredibly fit younger guy is set to start a war in two years. And me? I need to get out of here, obviously. So, I said, "I only liked you for your money." "Is that so? I have plenty of money. Does that mean you like me a lot, then?" He leaned in, planting a light kiss on my cheek, then asked in a low voice, "Besides the money, what else do you like about me? Yesterday, it seemed like you were quite into my face and body too." "What?" "I'm guessing you‚Äôre in love with me..." "Ack!" Instinctively, I screamed to block his love confession. But Kyle, as if he'd just realized something, grinned brightly. "I get it now, noona. You don‚Äôt want to hear me say I love you, right?" Exactly, that‚Äôs it! "In that case, I‚Äôll express it in a way you like better than words." With that, Kyle tugged his tie loose and stepped closer to me. No! I don't want you to express it with your body either!

item.title: The Female Lead is Looking at Me Differently (GL)
item.description: Synopsis: Wen Zhao transmigrated into a low-magic Xianxia novel, only to discover she'd become the cannon fodder second female lead who bullied the female lead, seduced the male lead, and was generally a green tea b*tch, lotus-flower-like antagonist. In the original novel, she was the catalyst for misunderstandings between the male and female leads, a dedicated tool character who lived until the grand finale. In the end, the male and female leads ended up together, while she suffered the consequences. To avoid a bad ending, Wen Zhao tried her best to cling to the female lead without being too out of character, hoping to safely exit the story. Although she was still being required by the system to perform actions befitting a second female lead, Wen Zhao believed the female lead would eventually understand her sincere heart! However, it seemed like the female lead was looking at her a bit strangely? ‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢ Male Lead: A Zhao, I suddenly realized that I might actually like you a little. Wen Zhao: ??? She thought this was the biggest deviation from the plot, but then the female lead slowly approached. Lowering her gaze slightly, the female lead, whose gaze was usually cold, revealed a hint of obsession and possessiveness. She walked up to Wen Zhao and smiled softly. She asked softly, "A Zhao, between him and me, who do you choose?" Wen Zhao: I choose you! I choose you! ‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢ One-Sentence Summary: Thank you everyone, I'm with the female lead now. Theme: Even when facing difficulties, one should strive to overcome them and have the determination to reverse their situation. Only through hard work can one achieve success. Victory and new surprises are waiting not far away.

item.title: The Tyrant's Happy Ending
item.description: BL fantasy novel set in a Western-style Omegaverse. It follows the story of Lyle Beltimore, a duke who rises to power after being betrayed by his first love, Yernen Helio, a prince who later becomes a tyrant. Lyle returns to the capital after years of war and finds Yernen dead. However, Yernen reincarnates into the body of Prince Fortnum, Lyle‚Äôs new fianc√©, and must now navigate his second life, torn between his past regrets and the possibility of a new future with Lyle. Themes of love, betrayal, revenge, and redemption are central to the plot, with intense emotional struggles and a chance at a happy ending in Yernen‚Äôs second life.

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.nameextend: The Disfigured Girlfriend Will Not Be a Cannon Fodder 037
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless‚Äîcapable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder's script, Sheng Nuan is terrified... Later: A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: "Nuan Nuan, you're not allowed to go anywhere except by my side..." The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with blood: "Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?" The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: "Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon." The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: "Nuan Nuan, it‚Äôs your choice‚Äîkill me, or save me." Sheng Nuan became even more panicked...

item.title: After Rebirth, I Married my Archenemy
item.nameextend: You think saying you won't fight is enough to end it?
item.description:
Before her death, Qun Qing hated the powerful official Lu Huating the most. She hated him for assisting the new emperor and for being cunning and insidious. She thought about him day and night, and tried her best to defeat him, but she was not his match. In the end, she became a cannon fodder in his hands. After Qun Qing died, she saw the princess of the fallen country that she had protected with her life, crying and leaning on the new emperor's chest: "Qung Qing is dead, what should I do?" The new emperor kissed her: "You will be fine, just love me." The princess burst into tears, like a delicate flower under the rain: "Qung Qing is dead, Your Majesty is all I have left." When she opened his eyes, Qun Qing had woke up three years ago. She stood up, woodenly packed her bags, and regardless of the princess's obstruction, took off her jade crown and walked away, dropped her female official's wooden seal, turned around and left, leaving behind ten years of careful planning and treading on thin ice. Restore the country? Pfft, restore it my foot. ------ The powerful minister Lu Huating is deeply cunning, ruthless, and dominates the power struggles of the court. Tired of the ugly nature of human hearts, his life has become dull and unfulfilling. Looking back on his life, the only thing that left an impression was a female officer, a spy, whom he poisoned to death at the age of twenty-six. For the love of the princess, she sacrificed his life for the country and schemed against him several times. In the end, she knelt in front of the Summer Palace, her facial expression remaining unchanged, with a look of resentment in her eyes, and sighed with a smile, "The king who wins is the ruler, and the one who loses is the defeated," before raising her head and drinking to the last drop. Blood poured from her lips, a thin layer of vivid red. When he opened his eyes again, Lu Huating returned to his twenty-three-year-old self. Lu Huating looked at the documents under his command, and felt even more bored. He put down his brush and leaned on the back of the chair: "Where is the female official accompanying Crown Princess?" "... She resigned. She asked me to tell My lord that she would not fight anymore." Lu Huating was silent for a while, and curled his lips coldly: "She said she won't fight, so the fight is over?"

item.title: My Husband Became the Most Powerful Minister
item.nameextend: "If we continue like this, we will both suffer losses!"
item.description: At the princess's banquet, in a secluded hall, Helan Ci pressed her palm against the wall, encountering the equally disheveled newly crowned top scholar Lu Wuyou. One was as delicate as a willow, the other had a flushed face. Their eyes met, and in each other's gaze, they saw a glimmer of despair. "I'll go first..." "I'll head that way..." However, what was even more despairing was the sound of the princess's maid and the second prince's attendant searching for them not far away. Helan Ci bit her lip: "What don't you just go to the princess?" Lu Wuyou endured: "I think the second prince is not bad either." Helan Ci: "If we keep talking, we'll only end up hurting each other!" Lu Wuyou closed his eyes: "Then let it be a mutual destruction." Helan Ci: "‚Ä¶?" A night later, their innocence was lost, and they were forced into marriage. Yet, with strong enemies lurking, this marriage was extremely difficult. On one side, there was the second prince, eagerly awaiting her husband's demise, and on the other, the princess, watching her with cold eyes. Helan Ci asked, ‚Äú‚Ä¶Can you handle this?‚Äù Lu Wuyou replied, ‚ÄúEven if I can‚Äôt, I have to. Who told me to marry you‚Äî I‚Äôm going to be a powerful minister. I can‚Äôt fall here.‚Äù Helan Ci, ‚ÄúThen do your best! I‚Äôm counting on you!‚Äù Lu Wuyou, ‚Äú‚Ä¶?‚Äù Years later, Lu Wuyou became the Prime Minister, holding the highest position among officials, wielding immense power across the land, and reflecting on the past. A student asked him how he had come this far. Prime Minister Lu thought to himself that as long as one marries a wife of extraordinary beauty, often coveted by others, it would always inspire one to strive to make progress. ===== Two chapters will be free every week (Sat & Sunday). If you enjoy this story consider rate and review this at NovelUpdates, also support me at ko-fi

item.title: Rebirth of the Excellent Daughter of the Marquis Household (REDMH)
item.description: Gu Yu Qi, a daughter born to a marquis household. She was beautiful with knowledge in both civil and military, and her kindness broader than the sky. It was love at first sight for her, and she insisted on marrying him and was happy even if she were to become a mistress. She worked hard to help him step by step to become the emperor. But what happened to her in the end? For ten whole years, she was humiliated and abandoned. Disheartened, she drank poison to end her life and set her place on fire, only to find herself back to when she was ten years old. It was the year she followed her mother into the capital. It wasn‚Äôt too late to change her fate. If Yun Ke had any regrets in his previous life, then it would be how he always kept thinking about a woman who died decades ago. Because of that, before he died, he secretly had the woman‚Äôs ashes pressed beneath his coffin. As the emperor, he had the final say of everything under the sky. So how could he allow that woman to be arrogant in front of him? Even at his deathbed, he would crush her beneath him. Who knew he‚Äôd be reborn again‚Ä¶ When the transmigrated girl meets the boy who was reborn, Gu Yu Qi simply wanted to yell at the sky. Just what are you playing at!?

item.title: The Eldest Legitimate Daughter is Both Beautiful and Valiant (ELDBBV)
item.description: In the previous life, the Zhenguo Duke‚Äôs mansion collapsed and completely vanished. In this lifetime, Bai Qing Yan, the eldest legitimate daughter was reborn and she will never let the Bai family follow the same footsteps than in the previous life. The sons of the Bai family are already dead, so is there no place for the Bai family to stand in the capital? Xiao Rong Yan, a wealthy businessman from the Wei Kingdom said: ‚ÄúFor hundreds of years, the Zhenguo Duke‚Äôs Bai family of military lineage, never produced any waste, and the family‚Äôs daughters are no exception." Later‚Ä¶ the eldest miss of the Bai family was this generation‚Äôs goddess of war, legend had it that she had never been defeated. The second miss of the Bai family was the resourceful matriarch at the newly appointed Zhongyong Marquis' mansion. The third miss of the Bai family is this world‚Äôs second richest merchant, a talent of the business world who can decide the rains and clouds. Bai Qing Yan was grateful to Xiao Rong Yan for having helped her several times in the previous life, and secretly sent him information several times. On a snowy night, they were blocked outside the city. Xiao Rong Yan: Miss Bai saved me from fire and water again and again, is it that you admire me? Bai Qing Yan said: Young Master Xiao has misunderstood. Xiao Rong Yan: I saved Miss Bai from fire and water again and again, can Miss Bai admire me? Bai Qing Yan: ‚Ä¶
